algorithms.imageProcessing

Class EdgeMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.imageProcessing.AbstractPointMatcher
      • algorithms.imageProcessing.EdgeMatcher

  • public final class EdgeMatcher
extends AbstractPointMatcher
    class to match the edges extracted from two images. The use of corners and PointMatcher should be preferred over this.
    Author:
    nichole

      TransformationPointFit refineTransformation(PairIntArray[] edges1, PairIntArray[] edges2, TransformationParameters params)
      refine the transformation params to make a better match of edges1 to edges2 where the points within edges in both sets are not necessarily 1 to 1 matches (that is, they are lines with uneven point intervals and densities).

    • Method Detail

      • refineTransformation

        public TransformationPointFit refineTransformation(PairIntArray[] edges1,
                                                   PairIntArray[] edges2,
                                                   TransformationParameters params)
        refine the transformation params to make a better match of edges1 to edges2 where the points within edges in both sets are not necessarily 1 to 1 matches (that is, they are lines with uneven point intervals and densities). 
             These are the parameters used for the search and they may need to be 
     altered with more test cases:
         float rotationHalfRangeInDegrees = 6;
         float rotationDeltaInDegrees = 2.f;
         float scaleHalfRange = 0.15f; 
         float scaleDelta = 0.025f;
         float translationXHalfRange = 10; 
         float translationXDelta = 4.f;
        Parameters:
        edges1 -
        edges2 -
        params -
        Returns:
